request.description:
Route for first user creation. When user firstly comes to our bot you should use it to generates his or her account.

That endpoint will return generated profile data and API token

response.name: Try create user with duplicate ID

request.description: Endpoint for patching main user information. If u r looking for updating diet or macronutrients params use the Params.set method.
Return current logged in user data.
Return current logged in user diet params
Route is used for setting diet and macronutrients params.
Use it to renew token for user or to check does user have an account (it returns 401 if doesnt)
Returns last generated diet for current user
Calculate diet by current user params.

response.name: Success with excluded
